title: Remove TopBanner image from global layout

requirements.summary: Remove the TopBanner image section from the shared app layout so the sticky header is the topmost UI element on all routes.
acceptanceCriteria: The app no longer renders the TopBanner area above the header on all routes.
The header remains sticky at the top (no blank banner space above it).
No visual regressions occur in page layout spacing on mobile (e.g., iPhone SE) and desktop.

file_operations.description: Remove the TopBanner import and its render from the Layout component so no banner image appears above the sticky Header on any route.
Delete the unused TopBanner component to prevent orphaned code and ensure the banner image cannot be re-rendered accidentally.
